ygData.msgSnippet: Darkangel wasted no time in activating the failsafes of the CR Tanks and geting him out of there as fast as he possibly could. Something was not right- Tyrael

Darkangel wasted no time in activating the failsafes
of the CR Tanks and geting him out of there as fast as
he possibly could. Something was not right- Tyrael was
not prone to rash action- whatever he just found, it
must have been something worthy of some serious worry.
 Brisky walking over to Tyrael, he decided that
whatever it was, they were all best prepared if they
knew exactly what they were dealing with.

"What is it? What did you discover?" 

 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
In his sorrows, Bloodblade noticed a flash on him and
suddenly 
focused on it. Void? Pain? What was going on?

Tyrael was curious at what was heppening, when
suddenly, a file 
appeared on the screen. The designation made him
doubt, then sent a 
chill in his body.

Tyrael: By the Matrix! Darkangel! Drag him out of the
base now!
